message.content:
1. The study was a double-blind, placebo-controlled, parallel-group, multinational phase III study.
2. The study involved patients who were 40 years of age or older.
3. The patients in the study had moderate-to-severe COPD.
4. The patients were randomized to receive either inhaled formoterol or a placebo.
5. The dosages of inhaled formoterol were either 4.5 or 9 μg.
6. The medication was administered twice daily.
7. The medication was administered via a Turbuhaler®.
8. The duration of the study was 12 weeks.

messages.content:
Statement: This double-blind, placebo-controlled, parallel-group, multinational phase III study randomized patients ≥ 40 years of age with moderate-to-severe COPD to inhaled formoterol 4.5 or 9 μg twice daily (bid) via Turbuhaler® or placebo for 12 weeks.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
